content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=5.5, y=0.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=5.5, y=0.5) and electricity group(position x=3.5, y=0.5)

### Offshore pump at position(x=-7.5, y=25.5)
Consists of offshore pump(position x=-7.5, y=25.5) and pipe group(position x=3.5, y=-2.5)

### Furnace group at position(x=52.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of following entities
- Furnace(position x=52.0, y=-84.0)
- Furnace(position x=52.0, y=-82.0)
- Furnace(position x=52.0, y=-80.0)
- Furnace(position x=62.0, y=-54.0)

### Lab at unknown position
Consists of lab with no power and doing automation research

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when placing entities
- Ensure the target position is empty before attempting to place an entity
- Make sure to provide a valid direction when placing an entity

### Errors when connecting entities
- Ensure the entities are close enough to be connected
- Make sure the connection points are valid and not occupied by other entities

### Errors when getting entities
- Ensure the entity exists at the specified position before attempting to get it

### Errors when using API
- Make sure to use the correct API functions and parameters to avoid errors
- Ensure the entity is in a valid state before attempting to perform actions on it
